rows.label: tlk45350351_04_msg0002
rows.name:
Not just a few of them, either. We're
even having to use the Divine Beast
ships' cabins as temporary lodgings.

rows.label: tlk45350351_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Only thing is... Even with all these
refugees, it's still just a fraction of
the people who lived in Acedia, right?

rows.label: tlk45350351_04_msg0004
rows.name:
These are the lucky ones who
escaped. There must be many more
who didn't make it out in time...

rows.label: tlk45350351_04_msg0005
rows.name:
I hope they're still alive somewhere,
somehow. Even if it's in Mors or
something crazy like that.
